attributes.action: Save our heroic PCSO’s so that they can continue to help keep us safe.
attributes.additional_details: PCSO’s are a critical component in helping to reduce crime and anti-social behaviour across London and they are making people feel safer in their homes and within their communities.  We ask Dave, Theresa, Boris and Stephen to please act now to keep our PCSO’s in place carrying out their often heroic jobs making Londoners safe.
attributes.background: We call on the Prime Minister David Cameron, Home Office Minister Theresa May, the Mayor of London Boris Johnson  and the Deputy Mayor for Policing Stephen Greenhalgh to halt the plans to sack PCSO’s in London.

rejection.details:
This petition has been rejected because the Metropolitan Police is a responsibility of the London Assembly and the Mayor of London. 

You might wish to consider petitioning the London Assembly, their petitions page can be found at: https://www.london.gov.uk/mayor-assembly/london-assembly/take-part/petitions
